name: Block Puzzle - Merge Style
description:
Place blocks and merge your way to the top in this simple, yet addictively fun game! With minimalistic design and intuitive gameplay, you’ll be hooked in no time. Combine the numbered blocks to pick up points, keeping the board as empty as possible to survive longer.

Challenge yourself to beat your high scores and rack up insane combos. Download today and see for yourself why it’s the perfect game for a quick pick-up-and-play session or a long gaming marathon.
